name: Moto Gp Racer Fast Bike Racing
name_original: Moto Gp Racer Fast Bike Racing
description:
Feel the thrill of authentic moto racing.
Dash into the mountains and make yourself crazy.
this game give you the pleasure of traveling around the mountain.
Moto Racer is a real based moto bike racing game.
basically its a lap racing game
Drag your bike through awesome challenges and amazing missions.
Beat your opponent to achieve more xp points and make money to unlock bikes and players.
two types of controls (Accelerometer, Touch Controls)
Stunning graphics and game play.
Customize your Bikes and Players
Multiple Racing Maps
Assisted braking available
XP points system to level up
Explosive music arouse your inner passionIf you think bikes racing games are always easy - think again!
